pr_title: Cleaning up code in GMTools and RAT Management files

timeline.message: Cleaning up code in GMTools and RAT Management files

timeline.bodyText: The second null check is here because performRollRat() can return null.
timeline.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText: You are correct, this is a dumb mistake on my side. It has been fixed.
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: We all miss simple stuff. That's why we double-check each others' work.
replies.author: neoancient

timeline.message: Reverting change that removed the lastRolledUnit null check after rerolling
